howFree.question: How is Deni AI completely free?
howFree.answer: Deni AI is able to offer premium AI services for free through an efficiency-focused approach and optimized infrastructure. We believe in making advanced AI accessible to everyone without paywalls or restrictions.

models.question: What models does Deni AI support?
models.answer: Deni AI provides access to all major AI models including Claude Sonnet 4, GPT-4.5, Gemini 2.5 Pro, o3, and many others. You can switch between models freely without any additional costs.

limitations.question: Are there any limitations to using Deni AI?
limitations.answer: Deni AI has virtually no limitations. You can send unlimited messages without hitting rate limits or token caps. The only features not currently supported are image generation (like DALL-E), which may be added in future updates.

dataHandling.question: How does Deni AI handle my data?
dataHandling.answer: We take privacy seriously. Your data is never sold to third parties and isn't used for training the AI models. We only store your conversations to provide the service and allow you to reference your past interactions.

account.question: Do I need to create an account?
account.answer: While you can use Deni AI without registration, creating a free account allows you to sync your conversation history across devices. Registration only requires an email address - no payment information or personal details are needed.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subtitle: How we handle your data and protect your privacy

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy describes how your personal information is collected, used, and shared when you use our Deni AI service.
introduction.operatedBy: Deni AI is operated by the Veltrix team.

informationCollection.title: Information We Collect
informationCollection.content: When you use our service, we may collect several types of information:

items.personalInfo: Personal information you provide to us, such as your name, email address, and profile picture when you create an account
items.usage: Information about how you use our service, including your conversation history, queries, and interactions with AI models
items.technical: Technical information such as your IP address, browser type, device information, and cookies

informationUse.title: How We Use Your Information
informationUse.content: We use the information we collect for various purposes, including:

items.service: To provide, maintain, and improve our services
items.improvement: To develop new features and enhance user experience
items.communication: To communicate with you about updates, security alerts, and support
items.security: To detect, prevent, and address technical issues and security threats

dataSharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share information in the following circumstances:

items.serviceProviders: With service providers who help us operate our service, such as cloud hosting providers
items.legal: When required by law, such as to comply with a subpoena or similar legal process
items.business: In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We take reasonable measures to help protect your personal information from loss, theft, misuse, unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.content: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, including:

items.access: The right to access personal information we hold about you
items.rectification: The right to request correction of inaccurate information
items.deletion: The right to request deletion of your personal information
items.restriction: The right to restrict or object to our processing of your information

cookies.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our service and hold certain information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time to reflect changes to our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on this page.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us via our GitHub repository or through our support channels.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our service

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Deni AI. These Terms of Service govern your use of our website, products, and services.
introduction.operatedBy: Deni AI is operated by the Veltrix team.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using our service, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you may not access the service.

eligibility.title: Eligibility
eligibility.content: You must be at least 13 years of age to use this service. By using our service, you represent and warrant that you meet this requirement.

account.title: Account Registration and Security
account.content: When you create an account with us, you must provide accurate information. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account, and you agree to:

items.accurate: Provide accurate and complete registration information
items.secure: Maintain the security of your account password
items.responsible: Be responsible for all activities that occur under your account
items.notification: Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account

userConduct.title: User Conduct
userConduct.content: You agree not to use our service to:

items.illegal: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
items.harmful: Post or transmit harmful, threatening, abusive, or unlawful content
items.spam: Distribute spam, chain letters, or promote pyramid schemes
items.security: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems or networks

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property Rights
intellectualProperty.content: The service and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of Deni AI and its licensors. The service is protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws.

userContent.title: User Content
userContent.content: You retain all your ownership rights to your content. However, by submitting content to our service, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, adapt, publish, and distribute your content.
userContent.license: This license continues until you remove your content from our service.

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.content: Your use of our service is at your sole risk. The service is provided on an 'AS IS' and 'AS AVAILABLE' basis. We expressly disclaim all warranties of any kind, whether express or implied.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: In no event shall Deni AI, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages resulting from your use of the service.

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless Deni AI and its licensors from and against any claims, liabilities, damages, judgments, awards, losses, costs, expenses, or fees arising out of your use of the service.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account and bar access to the service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. It is your responsibility to review these Terms periodically for changes.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us via our GitHub repository or through our support channels.
